# deviceReference

**Instance Property**

The reference to the virtual HID device.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated final let deviceReference: HIDDeviceClient.DeviceReference
```

## Discussion

Use to create a [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDDeviceClient], if creating a device and monitoring it within the same app is desired. For more details, see [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDDeviceClient/DeviceReference-swift.struct].

## Create a HID virtual device

- **init(properties:)**: Creates a virtual HID device.
- **activate(delegate:)**: Activate a newly created virtual device to begin receiving notifications and enable functionality.
